question_text: Which of the following best describes a public cloud deployment?
answer_options: A cloud hosted entirely within a private data center
A cloud accessible only to employees of a single company
A cloud service that is accessible over the internet by multiple customers
A cloud used for government-only infrastructure
correct_answer: A cloud service that is accessible over the internet by multiple customers
explanation: Public clouds are managed by third-party providers and are accessible by anyone over the internet. Examples include Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services.
